Apparatus.Commentary: After the Pāzand texts, Ǧāsās's Revāyat prescribes that the priest has to three times namāz to the thicket (se bār namāz bordan) and then recites once more xšnaōθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and the three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs that introduce the following Frauuarāne. To the three namāz correspond in Ankelsaria the triple recitation of xšnaōθra ahurahe mazdā̊ + one Aṣ̌əm Vohū. It is unclear whether the three namāz bordan in Ǧāsās’s Revāyat imply as well this triple recitation.
